Title: SQL Injection
Description: Potential SQL Injection Vector When Using `PDO_MySql`.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.10.0 before 1.10.9, all versions starting from 1.11.0 before 1.11.6
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.10.0, all versions starting from 1.10.9 before 1.11.0, all versions starting from 1.11.6
